sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from "react"; import "./Register.scss"; import axios from "axios"; import { Link, useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; function Register(props) { const [user, setUser] = useState(props.user || ""); const navigate = useNavigate(); async function registerUser() { try { const response = await axios.post("/register", { first_name: user.firstName, last_name: user.lastName, email: user.userEmail, password: user.userPassword, }); props.setStoredData(); navigate("/login"); console.log(response); } catch (err) { console.error(err); } } return (

Sign up now

{/* Form */}
{/* First name */} setUser((prev) => ({ ...prev, firstName: event.target.value, })) } />
{/* Last Name */} setUser((prev) => ({ ...prev, lastName: event.target.value, })) } />
{/* Email */} setUser((prev) => ({ ...prev, userEmail: event.target.value, })) } />
{/* Password */}
setUser((prev) => ({ ...prev, userPassword: event.target.value, })) } />
{/* Form Event Handler */}
Already have an account? Log In here
); } export default Register;
